definition: variant of 嘗|尝[chang2]/to taste/to experience

sentences.english: Serendipitous people are more fearless about trying something new.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔人们会更加勇于尝试新鲜事物。

sentences.english: What is more, the author also tries to construct the senior chemistry teaching model of developing autonomous learning.
sentences.chinese: 作者还尝试构建了高中化学自主探究教学模式。

sentences.english: I tried to persuade him but in vain.
sentences.chinese: 我尝试涚服他，但没有用。

sentences.english: Try living for a week in an "other centered" universe.
sentences.chinese: 尝试着一个星期生活在一个以“他人为中心”的世界。

sentences.english: Try not to use anonymous types in schemas.
sentences.chinese: 不要尝试在模式中使用匿名类型。

sentences.english: Computers let you try out different styles and ideas.
sentences.chinese: 电脑能让你尝试不同的风格和点子。

sentences.english: They did it, I’ve done it, and so can you.
sentences.chinese: 他们做到了，我也曾尝试过，你也可以做到的。

sentences.english: From time to time, some of my readers take a stab at converting me to their religion.
sentences.chinese: 我的一些读者时常尝试把我转变成他们的宗教的信徒。

sentences.english: Livorno have approached Juventus over the availability of defender Igor Tudor.
sentences.chinese: 利沃诺正在尝试得到尤文的铁卫图多尔。

sentences.english: Try to see what they see.
sentences.chinese: 尝试看看他们所看到的。

sentences.english: She never stopped trying to get pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 她始终没有停止过尝试受孕。

sentences.english: Please try, also, not to go totally freaking insane in the process.
sentences.chinese: 请尝试，还有，不要在这个过程中保持极度兴奋疯狂。

sentences.english: A design of high speed backplane bus is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一个高速背板总线的设计尝试。

sentences.english: Am I trying to do the job that cupid or God suppose to do?
sentences.chinese: 我是否尝试著做上帝跟邱比特的工作？

sentences.english: Now, try to write an acceptance email of your own.
sentences.chinese: 现在，尝试着写一封你自己的接收函。

sentences.english: Have the courage to try, what thing also difficult.
sentences.chinese: 没有勇气不尝试，啥事也难成啊。

definition: (abbr. for 嘗試錯誤|尝试错误) trial and error/failure
to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
to feel about/to grope about/to fumble/to do things slowly
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
